import React, { useState } from "react"; function Cart({ images, info } ) { const [pickUp, setPickUp] = useState(true); const [ship, setShip] = useState(false); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); console.log(info) if(!loading){ return (
{/*
Ready for pickup today
Eligible for curbside pickup
Get it tomorrow
Faster shipping is also aviable in checkout
*/}
${info[0].price}
); } } export default Cart;
